game.name: Crazy Coin Poker
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A high-octane fusion of Poker × Coin Pusher! Launch coins, build powerful hands, and score massive payouts. A roguelike buff system sends multipliers sky-high. Stronger hands trigger crazier effects—blinding lights, explosions, and pure dopamine-fueled chaos.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A high-octane fusion of Poker × Coin Pusher! Launch coins, build powerful hands, and score massive payouts. A roguelike buff system sends multipliers sky-high. Stronger hands trigger crazier effects—blinding lights, explosions, and pure dopamine-fueled chaos.
